text: Dang youren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingxian de qishi shi, naxie bu xiwang yu wo xiang hui de ren shuo:“Qing ni [mu sheng] ling na yi bu “gulanjing” lai, huo qing ni xiugai ta ba!” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo wu quan shanzi xiugai ta, wo zhi zunxing wo suo feng dao de qishi. Jiaru wo weikang wo de zhu, wo dique weiju zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
